author: jochembrouwer
content:
We pass all the tests here: https://github.com/ethereumjs/ethereumjs-monorepo/pull/2955

Changes are in the description, the final 2 points are which fix these fixtures for us (other changes have to do with engine api).

Notably, it found the  bug that EthJS did not charge for 4844 access lists ðŸ˜®
